prompts.prompt: ï½›perfect composition, impeccable attention to detail, highest quality, rich detail, sharp focus, 8K/4K resolution, clear edges, exquisite details, perfect composition, depth of field, cinematic lighting, vibrant colors, award-winning style, professional level, perfect depiction. Create an extremely detailed, hyper-realistic 3D graphite pencil sketch depicting face of a Chinese idol girl, drawn on textured white notebook paper with clear paper quality, delicate details, and subtle imperfections. The facial sketch should be perfectly identical to reference photo displayed on an iPhone placed next to notebook. The iPhone screen clearly displays artist original portrait photograph with natural reflections and soft sunlight reflections on glass.ï½

meta.system_instruction: PRIORITY: Focus strict facial identity preservation on TWO FOREGROUND CHARACTERS (Bottom Left and Bottom Right). The other characters are secondary.
meta.style: viral social media photography, worms eye view, crystal clear blue sky

reference_usage.instruction: Map uploaded face reference(s) specifically to two girls closest to camera (at bottom).
reference_usage.logic: Bottom Left Girl = Face Ref A. Bottom Right Girl = Face Ref B (or same ref if only one provided). Top characters = Generic compatible faces.
reference_usage.focus_weight: Foreground: 100% Identity match; Background: 50% Vibe match

scene.perspective: Extreme low angle (camera on ground looking up)
scene.background: Pure gradient blue sky, no clouds, bright daylight
scene.composition: 5 girls forming a circle, but bottom two are much larger and closer to lens

subject_group.concept: A group of friends looking down at camera, framing shot

PRIMARY_SUBJECTS.note: These two must look exactly like reference images

character_bottom_left.position: Bottom Left (7 oclock), closest to lens
character_bottom_left.face: Face Reference A, distinct features, big cheerful smile showing teeth
character_bottom_left.outfit: White fuzzy texture jacket or sweater, wearing large white plush earmuffs (cute winter vibe)
character_bottom_left.action: Leaning in close, hair hanging down slightly

character_bottom_right.position: Bottom Right (5 oclock), closest to lens
character_bottom_right.face: Face Reference B, distinct features, soft sweet smile
character_bottom_right.outfit: Dark navy or black coat, wearing a black beret or bucket hat

SECONDARY_SUBJECTS.note: These characters provide context. Faces can be softer or less detailed.
SECONDARY_SUBJECTS.top_group: Three other girls completing circle at top (10, 12, 2 oclock positions)
SECONDARY_SUBJECTS.styling: Wearing winter coats (purple/black), hand gestures waving at camera, slightly out of focus or further away compared to foreground

lighting.direction: Frontal lighting (falling from sky onto their faces)
lighting.effect: Bright skin tones, cold weather rosy cheeks blush effect, sharp details on earmuffs and hats

prompt.vibe: Best friends forever, joyful reunion, winter sunshine, energetic, high clarity
prompt.negative_prompt: distorted faces in foreground, ugly teeth, bad anatomy, dark shadows on faces, cloudy sky, buildings, blurry foreground, fish-eye distortion too strong
